title: Volvo EX90
detail: Volvo Car electric vehicles will soon support the North American Charging Standard, enabling access to Tesla's Supercharger network. This will complement the wide access of fast chargers currently available via the CCS (Combined Charging System) network available today.

title: Audi 2024 e-tron GT
detail: In our testing, both the e-tron GT and the RS e-tron GT beat their respective range estimates as we observed the same 240 miles of range for each car. Even with this result though, driving range is short of rivals such as the Model S and the Lucid Air. The exhilarating performance of the Audi e-tron GT.

title: 2024 BMW X7
detail: The 2025 BMW X7 Convertible, engineered by BMW, is a standout sport convertible. Everyday cars are turning more into fighter jets. BMW's new eye-tracking Highway Assistant technology part of its Driving Assistance Professional package on the redesigned 2024.

title: Honda Prologue
detail: The 2024 Prologue, Honda's latest attempt at an EV after the ill-fated Clarity sedan and Fit EV, is a mid-size SUV with a restrained look that doesn't shout its eco-friendly mission. The Prologue rides on a platform developed jointly with General Motors and is powered by the same the last battery pack.

title: Volkswagen Beetle
detail: Fifty years ago, on February 17th, 1972, the 15,007,034th Volkswagen Beetle was produced in Germany, surpass the production record that had previously only been held by the Ford Model T. When the first Beetle rolled off the production line, it was simply called the Volkswagen. In celebration of that record-breaking achievement.

title: Rolls Royce Phantom
detail: The Rolls-Royce Phantom is a full-sized luxury saloon manufactured by Rolls-Royce Motor Cars. It is the eighth and current generation of the Rolls-Royce Phantom, debuting in 2017, and the second launched by Rolls-Royce under BMW ownership. It is offered in two wheelbase lengths. This is the current flagship model.

title: Lexus ES
detail: The Lexus ES has luxury down pat, with a supremely quiet and comfortable interior, a compliant suspension, and plenty of standard equipment. A trio of power trains is offered, comprising a tepid four-cylinder, a smooth V-6, and an efficient hybrid. If all that sounds good, you can stop here.

title: Bugatti Chiron Super
detail: The Super Sport is one of several variants the Bugatti Chiron Super, along with the Pur Sport, and the base Chiron. The Pur Sport serves as the track-oriented version of the Chiron, while the Super Sport offers several modifications that give it an even higher top speed including a longer tail with stacked.

title: Porsche Panamera E-Hybrid
detail: It might have its engine up front and a duo of extra doors but it's clear from the way that the 2025 Porsche Panamera sedan drives that it's a close relative of the iconic 911 sports car. Up front is a turbocharged V-6 with 348 horsepower.
